Text: Since in Mininova u were best music uploader

I was a late starter at Mininova.. i have been here since my first upload.. The Best is/were does not seem important no more to me.. it did in the begining But it was a passing phase and a one track mind of revenge of some comments from a few of the Skirgsks followers.. I asked a simple Question and i got abused. so i thought simply Fuck This I'll Show These Pricks. I've had my time and yes was very popular indeed.. But i'm not one track minded no more.. shit i hardly upload anything... i'm more about helping others in Forums and PM's everywhere, this way i actually get to talk to people and to me that is of more satisfaction indeed... :)

well said bubanee.  i think i'm starting to become that "one track minded" person you are talking about.  but its very hard to be nice when you know you upload quality and there are people complaining about what you post.  i post the best quality stuff and there is that one random person saying the quality sucks when you have 100 people saying its great!

i need to not let it bother me because those 100 people are happy and that's more important than that 1 guy being a jerk.
kick a$$ song. Thx for the upload. The length of this song is legit.

God Bless You Bubs


You're the Audio King of TBP
wow downloaded in under a minute!!!!! You the man! keep it up PIRACY RULES!
Thanks for the music. :D Awesome quality.
perfect torrent . your a legend man. thanks heaps.

Cheers All!
